channel.title: 2 Questions [Rep++]
channel.description:
Where would I go to change the location of the re-spawning arena after death? And also, I want to make a ::help command that would open a quest interface, any ideas how I would do that?
Atomics 562 server.
I've been searching around for a while and haven't found anything, so if you can help I would be greatfull.

item.title: 2 Questions [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @aaronmead aaronmead
item.description:
@aaronmead wrote:

On death …source>src>com>rs2hd>model>entity
public static final Location DEFAULT_LOCATION = Location.location(2965, 3380, 0); <-- in Entity

Help command code:
if (cmd[0].equals("::help")) {
player.getActionSender().sendInterface(174, false);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Your Server Name Here help”, 174, 1);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 2);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 3);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 4);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 5);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 6);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 7);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 8);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 9);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 10);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 11);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 12);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 13);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 14);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 15);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 16);
player.getActionSender().sendString(“Help stuff here”, 174, 17);
}

Hope I helped.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

not very good with 562’s but I believe with the ::help you could take something thats already written in there; the commands class perhaps. With the spawning method for the arena is it in a certain area that you want them to respawn in a certain x and y; not the default?

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Questions [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @Jammydee Jammydee
item.description:
@Jammydee wrote:

For the respawn area, you would need to open client.java and search for the X coords you go to after you die, or the Y coords, so die on your server do ::mypos or whatever, get the coords and search in client.java

Read full topic

item.description:

I don’t code 562 at all but maybe just search for the “x coord” or “y coord”
:S Sorry I know that prolly wont work. Idk
